#with specular box & triangle
#with plane implementation
clear
screen 600 600
background 0.8 0.8 0.8
camera 225 225 300 0 0 -1 0 1 0 575
light 0.9 0.9 0.9 -1 -1 0
light 0.5 0.4 0.9 0 -1 0
#orthocamera
#plane 0 1 0.1 0 10 0 0.003 0.156 0.047 0.01 0.466 0.117 1 1 1
box -200 0 -600 650 20 -300 0.3529 0.3529 0.3529 0.3529 0.3529 0.3529 1 1 1
box 400 25 -400 470 95 -300 0.0209 0.09 0.5 0.7 0.9 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.5
sphere 50 285 95 -550 0.0509 0.3529 0.0509 0.7529 0.3019 0.5019 1 1 1
sphere 100 80 180 -600 0.286 0.117 0.007 0.509 0.32 0.043 1 1 1
sphere 65 290 80 -270 0.0138 0.0680 0.510 0.122 0.427 0.278 1 0.3 0.7
sphere 50 150 200 -400 0.418 0.2667 0.107 0.4118 0.2863 0.396  0.2 1 1
sphere 120 100 400 -400 0.28 0.1 0.5 0.005 0.7 0.3 0.5 1 1
triangle 500 520 -350 450 400 -650 300 300 -400 0.468 0.119 0.313 0.28 0.33 0.65 0.2 0.8 0.9
triangle 450 450 -500 400 200 -250 500 500 -800 0.1 0.6 0.3 0.7 0.2 0.83 1 0.3 0.8
trace
tiffwrite ../Images/1.tif
quit
